title: GenealogyJ
text: GenealogyJ is a viewer and editor for <a href="genealogy">genealogic data</a>, suitable for hobbyists, family <a href="historian">historian</a>s and genealogy <a href="researcher">researcher</a>s. GenealogyJ is written in Java and so is available on most platforms and supports the <a href="GEDCOM">GEDCOM</a> standard. Many reports like <a href="family%20tree">family tree</a>, table, timeline and <a href="geography">geography</a> are available.
